      • addKillShot

        public void addKillShot(Player shootingPlayer,
                        boolean overkill)
        This method award points in the killshot track. It checks whether or not the killshot is an overkill, and decreases the number of skulls in the gameBoard.
        Parameters:
        shootingPlayer - player how has shot.
        overkill - true if the kill is also an overkill.
